name: Walrein
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

poke_power.name: Gather Ice
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Walrein from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may attach as many {W} Energy cards from your hand to Walrein as you like.

attacks.name: Cold Crush
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Walrein and then discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
